metadata.synopsis: A tiefling refugee reacts to the druids turning hostile against all the tieflings (both during and after battle).

0.speaker: Xeph
0.text: Thought we were safe here. But nowhere's safe, is it?
0.context: NodeContext: Post-battle. Even in victory, attitude's a little defeated.

1.speaker: Xeph
1.text: The druids have turned on us - defend yourself!

2.speaker: Xeph
2.text: I was so relieved when we found this place. Now I can't wait to put it behind me.
2.context: NodeContext: Post-battle. Even in victory, attitude's a little defeated.
